Package actor

Class Scissors

java.lang.Object
actor.GameObject
actor.Scissors
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockedLocation
public class Scissors extends GameObject implements BlockedLocation
Scissors dart around, only changing direction when they are unable to move forward. It's hard to catch the running scissors!
